books.author: by Jonathan Allen and Amie Parnes
books.description: An examination of Hillary Clinton’s presidential campaign.
books.name: SHATTERED

books.author: by Elizabeth Warren
books.description: The Massachusetts senator offers a program for Democratic resistance to President Trump.
books.name: THIS FIGHT IS OUR FIGHT

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Diane Ackerman
books.description: How a Warsaw couple sheltered Jews and members of the Resistance during World War II. Originally published in 2007; now the basis of a movie,
books.name: THE ZOOKEEPER’S WIFE

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Bruce Feirstein
books.description: A defense of “old school” traditional values versus “snowflakes."
books.name: OLD SCHOOL

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Charlamagne Tha God
books.description: The radio personality presents his life story and offers advice for success.
books.name: BLACK PRIVILEGE

books.author: by Connor Franta
books.description: The internet personality discloses his struggles with depression and other issues in short essays and diarylike entries.
books.name: NOTE TO SELF

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were cultured without her permission in 1951. Originally published in 2010 and the basis of the HBO movie.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: A collection of speeches by the Pulitzer Prize-winning historian, focused on American values.
books.name: THE AMERICAN SPIRIT

books.author: by Margot Lee Shetterly
books.description: The story of the black women mathematicians at then-segregated NASA and its precursor. The basis of the movie.
books.name: HIDDEN FIGURES

books.author: by Steve Case
books.description: In the current era, entrepreneurs will use technology to revolutionize various sectors of the economy.
books.name: THE THIRD WAVE

books.author: by David Limbaugh
books.description: The four Gospel stories are combined into a unified account.
books.name: THE TRUE JESUS

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: A New Yorker writer searches for a British explorer who disappeared in the Amazon in 1925. Originally published in 2009 and the basis of the 2017 movie.
books.name: THE LOST CITY OF Z

books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR
